sub_title: Legal Officer at United Nations International Residual Mechanism for Criminal Tribunals (IRMCT)
summary:
Legal professional with knowledge of various fields of international law, European Union law, and Dutch law. Most experience in international criminal law and international (investment) arbitration. Always eager to learn about different fields. 

Professional experience at, among others, the UN, the Netherlands Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and various law firms. Worked and studied in The Netherlands, Brussels, London, Paris, New York, Buenos Aires, Santiago de Chile and Kigali, Rwanda. Currently based in Arusha, Tanzania. 

Law studies at the University of Amsterdam and Columbia University in New York, second master's degree in international affairs at Sciences Po Paris. 

Fluent in Spanish, French, English and Dutch, good understanding of Portuguese and German, learning Swahili.
